title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 6F.11 - STAY IN LANE Sign (R4-9)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 6F.11 - STAY IN LANE Sign (R4-9)

State Regulations
INSERT the following paragraph: Guidance: 01A If a STAY IN LANE sign is used, it should be
accompanied by a solid double white line to prohibit lane
changing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
6F.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
